verses.roman:
caitanya-gosāñi yei kahe, sei mata sāra
āra yata mata, sei saba chārakhāra"

synonyms: caitanya-gosāñi—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yei kahe—whatever He has said; sei mata sāra—that explanation is actually the essence of Vedic knowledge; āra yata mata—any other opinion not in collaboration with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's statement; sei—these; saba chārakhāra—all distortions.
translation: "Whatever meaning Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu gives is perfect. Any other interpretation is only a distortion."
